verses.verse: Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>summoned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> in your <S%H241>hearing,<s%> that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> them and <S%H8104>observe<s%> them <S%H6213>carefully.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us at <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did not <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with our fathers, but with us, [with] <S%H1>all<s%> <S%H3605>those<s%> of us <S%H428>alive<s%> <S%H2416>here<s%> <S%H6311>today.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%> at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%>

[while] I was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and you at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> to <S%H5046>declare<s%> to you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> for you were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> and did not <S%H5927>go<s%> up the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%>
'I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery.<s%>
'You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me.

'You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourself an <S%H6459>idol,<s%> [or] <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8544>likeness<s%> [of] <S%H834>what<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> or on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> or in the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H7812>worship<s%> them or <S%H5647>serve<s%> them; for I, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the fathers on the <S%H1>children,<s%> and on the <S%H1121>third<s%> and the <S%H8029>fourth<s%> [generations] of those who <S%H7256>hate<s%> Me,
but <S%H6213>showing<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to <S%H505>thousands,<s%> to those who <S%H157>love<s%> Me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H5352>leave<s%> him <S%H5352>unpunished<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5375>takes<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
<S%H8104>'Observe<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H6942>keep<s%> it <S%H6942>holy,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.
<S%H8337>'Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H5647>labor<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4399>work,<s%>

but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> [in it] you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> you or your <S%H1121>son<s%> or your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> or your <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> or your <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>servant<s%> or your <S%H7794>ox<s%> or your <S%H2543>donkey<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle<s%> or your <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> stays with you, <S%H4616>so<s%> that your <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> and your <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>servant<s%> may <S%H5117>rest<s%> as well as you.

'And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of <S%H8033>there<s%> by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and by an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3513>'Honor<s%> your father and your <S%H1>mother,<s%> as the <S%H517>Lord<s%> your <S%H3068>God<s%> has <S%H430>commanded<s%> you, that your <S%H6680>days<s%> may be <S%H3117>prolonged,<s%> and that it may <S%H748>go<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> with you on the <S%H3190>land<s%> <S%H127>which<s%> the <S%H834>Lord<s%> your <S%H3068>God<s%> <S%H430>gives<s%> you.
'You shall not <S%H7523>murder.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H1589>steal.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> and you shall not <S%H183>desire<s%> your neighbor's <S%H1004>house,<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> or his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> or his <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>servant,<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H2543>donkey<s%> or <S%H3605>anything<s%> that belongs to your neighbor.'

<S%H428>"These<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6951>assembly<s%> at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> [of] the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and [of] the <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>gloom,<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and He <S%H3254>added<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%> And He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them on <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to me.

"And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> while the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> was <S%H1197>burning<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> that you <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to me, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%> and your <S%H2205>elders.<s%>

"And you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>shown<s%> us His <S%H9202>glory<s%> and His <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> and we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> His <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire;<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> with <S%H120>man,<s%> yet he <S%H2421>lives.<s%>

<S%H6258>'Now<s%> then <S%H4100>why<s%> should we <S%H4191>die<s%>? For <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> us; <S%H518>if<s%> we <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%> then we shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

'For <S%H4310>who<s%> is there of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> as we [have], and <S%H2421>lived<s%>?

<S%H7126>'Go<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>says;<s%> then <S%H1696>speak<s%> to us <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you, and we will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> [it.]'

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words<s%> when you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you. They have <S%H3190>done<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that they have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H4310>'Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that they <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H3824>heart<s%> in them, that they would <S%H3372>fear<s%> Me, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H3605>always,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with them and with their <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5769>forever!<s%>
<S%H1980>'Go,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to your <S%H168>tents.<s%>"

'But as for you, <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> by Me, that I may <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> them, that they may <S%H6213>observe<s%> [them] in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> them to <S%H3423>possess.<s%>'

"So you shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you; you shall not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

"You shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and that it may be <S%H2895>well<s%> with you, and that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> [your] <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3423>possess.<s%>
